tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

i think that this is prove that european movies﻿ are better than americans
the﻿ fuck u talking about she fucking hot

1:18 Ding dong...
... Chrushed!﻿
I love the lady in that video..and i love the part when she removed her clothes﻿ at the guy's hideout.
dude, she's﻿ a shit.
Biggest BMW﻿ commercial.
thumbs﻿ up if u like metallica songs
8 series﻿ lol.. xD
Transporter -﻿ Transformers, youtube thinks its all the same

dude: you ready.﻿ lets go. dude 2: hang on whats that noise. chinese lady: aaaahhhhh frank:ooohhhhh feminent. dude:(knocks on the door) room service. frank: im busy get lost. im growing into a true man. dude 2: allow him blad. dude:allo the hype
This﻿ movie and much more can be watched for absolutley free ona a website called SHANNOSPOT(.) COM. God Bless you
dude:knock knock dude 2: who there? dude:look through ur door hole dude2:OH SHI... *door is kicked down on him* XD thumbs up for me writing this on my﻿ wii.
she﻿ is not
yes, but i am not a gay and i dont﻿ think shes hot.
i guess not to﻿ a gay
Shu qi!!! Love you!!!﻿

1:16 *Din Don*
Dude - How could be? Who is thi...? *Door Smash*
Dude - Hello Frank. How's it hanging? Frank - oh, you know, Im traying to found somone that tried to kill me. Always the same. And so will be in other 2, if not 3 movies.﻿
SONG : Bionic Jive - RIcochet ﻿

The soundtrack in this movie KICKED ASS,whether it be smooth relaxing chilled out music,or kick-ass rap music while doing the best fight scene ever and stealing﻿ a bad guy's Mercedes while smashing through his garage.
Greatest action movie﻿ ever not a great trailer
Brate prvi deo najbolji ..:P﻿
